name: About me
body:
Hello, my name is James

I’m a London-based web development contractor, working mainly with Linux, Python, vim, whiteboards and hopefully as many excellent people as possible.

During my time with web, I’ve worked in a number of different roles focused on development - from the specification and design, to implementation, management and test. A full breakdown is on my StackOverflow Careers profile.

You can contact me about any potential projects by emailing me on hi AT jamescooke DOT info.
Elsewhere on the web

    CV on SO Careers
    GitHub
    Twitter
    StackOverflow profile
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
